content: Absolutely love this app. We use it at our church for controlling our camera.
replyContent: Awesome, so glad you like it!

content: A great app. Very responsive and easy to use.

replyContent: Thank you for the feedback and the great ideas! I’ll work on incorporating those into the next version.

content: This would be a much more useful app if it gave a view from the camera.
Fantastic for camera control but you need a laptop or a tablet to view the changes being made. There are no live feeds of the camera with this app.

Great to have this app available to help control the camera while away from the computer. However, I am giving 3 stars because I have to sometimes hit the same preset button a total of about three times just to make sure it goes where it's supposed to. This is not good especially if I am using this app as a remote and don't have a screen in front of me to verify that it is working properly. Please fix! I don't mind paying for the app, but all the more reason why this needs to be fixed.
Hey guys. Good app. Any chance of adding a small preview window ?
Need a option for copy camera with preset so you can just change ip on setting for inside and outside network control.

Did not work on pixelbook (via Google Play Store). Tried to get refund and app would not allow. Changed app to "Family" status and downloaded it on my Pixel 3 Android Phone....will see how it works there. I did pay for the Ipad version and it seems to work fine, but as others have stated, no preview ability makes it less desirable.
Great app. Quick and accurate control of camera. Easy to setup and use. Works better than trying to control from Mac.

This is the best camera control app I have found for PTZOptics cameras. Clean and simple. I have purchased both the IOS and Android versions. 2 requests to make it even better.. Please move the delete button further away from the close button when adding a camera... It's easier to hit than you think... Also... I would love a backup option somthing to save camera settings and presets whether local or cloud.
no preview. only moves but you need to be buy the display.

replyContent: Can you tell me more about why the app scored so low in your review?  Was there a feature you were expecting that wasn’t there?

content: Very good app as far as software goes, better than the desk top software, it have some small glitches but I believe it have room for more improvement. I use it for church ptz optics 20x, keep it up
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback!  Please let us know about the small glitches you have experienced so that we can address them for you.  You can contact us on our web page: https://www.pantiltzoom.cam/support/

content: I was using a Joystick (Xbox 360) controller for this and this is so much better.   Being able to set the speed and being able to use more than one camera setting for the same camera makes it even more useful.   Thanks for a great tool - and the PRICE is right.
replyContent: Thank you Boris, so glad you like it!

content:
Rock-solid control of multiple cameras for live streaming, our church's AV 
team couldn't live without it! Also this app is much more affordable than 
the alternative solutions on the market. The developer is super smart and 
extremely responsive.

Best PTZ controller I've used either hardware or software.   Great features and fantastic control using the VISCA over IP protocol.   Developer is actively developing the app and is receptive to new feature ideas, bug fixes and general product improvement.   PTZTiltZoom gets my highest recommendation.

This app is outstanding. Not only does it look great, it works great. 
Joystick control is very accurate and easy to use. I like the better than 
my hardware unit.
